name: Give Earth Space
description:
Defend the Earth from alien invaders and get a high score!

This game is created for gamesplusjames game jam 2 with a theme "SPACE" and my first time joining a game jam. 

Check it out. https://itch.io/jam/gamesplusjam2

Suggestions and critics are appreciated. Please let me know what you think or if you find bugs and errors.

Android version coming soon.
